snippet.title: Escape PS2 Reveal Hagrid Trailer
snippet.description:
Download the game here:
https://lolscrubs.itch.io/escape-ps2-hagrid

About

Hagrid makes his return in this mind-breaking sequel to the all-time bestselling piece of software junk "Escape PS1 Hagrid". With over 200 game of the year awards, before the release this game happens to be a more than worthy successor to its predecessor.

16 times the detail

"Escape PS2 Hagrid" offers a more visually appearing gaming experience than ever before with full Ray-Tracing Support on Windows XP flagship computers. Never before have you been able to enjoy the chunky being that is Hagrid in 4K resolution.

This game offers a guaranteed bug-free experience. If you encounter any game beaking mechanics you should be aware that these are not bugs but unplanned features.

Social media

E-Mail: megabytemedia18@gmail.com

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCwrSfc2UKrp1QKaEkBt3mFw

Twitter: @MediaMegabyte

Discord: Lolscrubs#0442 (for feedback, ideas, questions, etc.)
